head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HESTER, MELVYN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HESTER, MELVYN F.

block.p: HESTER-Melvyn F. On July 4, 2000, at age 61. Beloved husband of Laura Pires-Hester. Loving son of Ditta Hester. Dear brother of Grace Cox, Hayden Hester and Paul Hester. Adored uncle, nephew, cousin, friend, fellow minister and colleauge of many. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81st St., Thursday, 6-9 PM. Reposing Friday, 5-7 PM, Bronx-Westchester Community Church, 358 South 9th Ave, corner of West 5th St, Mount Vernon, NY. Service to follow at 7 PM. Funeral service will be held at The Riverside Church, 122nd St. and Claremont Ave., Saturday, 10 AM. Interment to follow at Mount Hope Cemetery. Contributions in his memory may be made to the Bronx-Westchester Community Church, 358 South 9th Ave., Mount Vernon, NY 94663-1375.
